ahk.debuggers.program.description: Absolute path to an ahk file.
ahk.debuggers.captureStreams.description: Whether to receive standard io stream.
ahk.debuggers.AhkExecutable.description: Absolute path of executable file of AutoHotKey(deprecated, use runtime instead)
ahk.debuggers.runtime.description: Absolute path of executable file of AutoHotKey. The extension will prefer this option as interpreter path.
ahk.debuggers.args.description:
Command line arguments passed to the program.

Can be an array of strings.
ahk.debuggers.port.description: The port on which to listen for XDebug.
